version_description:
- Brand new iMessage app to share your creations with your family and friends!
- UI improvements
- Localization improvements
- Bug fixes

Thank you for your amazing feedback.
If you have any questions, suggestions or issues, please feel free to contact us at:
support@inookta.com

- HomeKit: Pair your smart lighting system and experience ultimate relaxation!
- App optimized for iPhone 8 and iPhone 8 Plus
- More settings are now available directly from the app

Thank you for your amazing feedback.
If you have any questions, suggestions or issues, please feel free to contact us at:
support@inookta.com

- App optimized for the latest iPhone models.
- Minor bugs have been fixed.

Thank you for your amazing feedback.
If you have any questions, suggestions or issues, please feel free to contact us at:
support@inookta.com

Hello! This new version fixes some bugs and includes some optimisations.

Keep writing at support-taomix@mwmapps.com, your feedback are everything to us! And if you like TaoMix, make sure to rate it on the store :)

- Fixed a bug that could prevent users from importing audio files from GarageBand.
- A few other minor bugs have been fixed.

Thank you for your amazing feedback.
If you have any questions, suggestions or issues, please feel free to contact us at:
support@inookta.com
